_header: In this treatise the which I think to write
Subjects: manners, treatises on; children, instructions for behaviour of; courtesy books
_description: ‘The Babees Book’ — thirty-one stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar5086.First Lines:
In this tretys the which I thenke to wryteOut of Latyn in to my
                    comvne langage…
BLHar5086.Last Lines:
…That thurh your nurture and youre governaunceIn lastynge
                    blysse þes nowe your self auaunce
BLHar5086.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             The Babees Book, etc.
EETS
         o.s. 32 (1868); rev. ed.  Early English Meals and
                Manners London: Trübner, 1876; repr. 1973: orig. ed.1-9; rev. ed 250-8.
